Commands.Red Spiral: 4-hit magic BRV attack + HP attack  Self: 3 turns ATK Up I  Triggers HP attack Whiteout from third use
Commands.Whiteout: 5-hit Ice BRV magic attack + HP attack.
Commands.White Whorl: 4-hit Wind magic BRV attack + HP attack  Target: Fair chance DEF Down I for 2 turns  Triggers HP attack Luminescence from third use
Commands.Luminescence: 5-hit Holy BRV magic attack + HP attack.  Target: 1 turn Blind
Commands.Pyroclasm: 4-hit Fire magic BRV attack + HP attack  Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%  Deals 20% HP damage to enemies other than target  Becomes Pyroclasm+ for only next turn after using Red Spiral or White Whorl
Commands.Pyroclasm+: after using Red Spiral or White Whorl

Artifacts.Low BRV Attack Up: Raises Attack by 5% when BRV is under Initial BRV
Artifacts.HP Damage Guard: Raises Defense Power by 20% after taking HP damage
Artifacts.Mighty Red Spiral: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Red Spiral by 10%
Artifacts.Mighty White Whorl: Raises BRV Damage dealt by White Whorl by 10%

Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.Red Spiral Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Red Spiral.
Passives.Red Spiral Cartridge: Increases the max uses of Red Spiral by 1.
Passives.White Whorl Cartridge: Increases the max uses of White Whorl by 1.
Passives.White Whorl Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with White Whorl.
Passives.Spirit of Competition: Grants 100% critical hit rate when BRV equals or exceeds Initial BRV and target's BRV is over twice of that BRV.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Longing for the Sky: Slightly raises Speed for 1 turn when BRV equals 0.
Passives.High Speed Buff: Largely raises SPD with active buffs
Passives.Red Spiral Extension: Red Spiral use +1Red Spiral triggers Whiteout from second useModerate BRV damage boost to Red SpiralModerate BRV damage boost to Whiteout
Passives.Buffed Attack Boost Up: Moderately raises MAX BRV, ATK with active buffs
Passives.White Whorl Extension: White Whorl use +1White Whorl triggers Luminescence from second useModerate BRV damage boost to White WhorlModerate BRV damage boost to Luminescence

Weapons.Demonsbane CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability Pyroclasm.
Weapons.Platinum Sword CP: 15: Increases Red Spiral's potency and extends the duration of Attack Up
Weapons.Reeler's Edge CP: 15: Slightly increases Max BRV and Attack for 5 turns after breaking an enemy.
Weapons.Zwill Blade CP: 35: Increases the potency of White Whorl and Luminescence.Increases the potency of Defense Down and extends its duration.Also raises the success rate of Defense Down and Blind.
